body_html:
Yes, it helps.

Finally, I could build the tensorflow r.1.0. on my mac !! Thank you so much.

I had to set all the environment variables though (e.g., save in the .profile file)

export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
export PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$PATH

and it won't work in the tensorflow folder for some reason :-) #3217

body:
Yes, it helps. 

Finally, I could build the tensorflow r.1.0. on my mac !! Thank you so much. 

I had to set all the environment variables though (e.g., save in the .profile file)

export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
export PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$PATH


and it won't work in the tensorflow folder for some reason :-) [#3217](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3217)
